The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.<!--2502f1a698b3751726fa55edcda76cd3-->

#### Coverage

| Coverage  | Change ([pull 14658](https://drahtbot.github.io/reports/coverage/bitcoin/bitcoin/14658/to

Good to have. A bug where generating the help crashes would not be critical but would be very embarrassing, good to check for that (especially as some help refactors are on the horizon).\nutACK bbbbb3f8850907d413db4715c10ef6df055234f6
There is no downside in logging the results to the temp dir. It'd make it easier to debug in case the node crashed while in the loop. Also, you could pass `--nocleanup` for manual inspection, etc...
